thread.title: Need suggestion: Kumaon Trip in first week of December '15
thread.title_full: Need suggestion: Kumaon Trip in first week of December '15

author: Avishek_T
title: Need suggestion: Kumaon Trip in first week of December '15
text: # 1 Hi All, I 'm planning a solo trip to the hills during first week of Dec '15 . Following are the alternative plans I'm thinking: Option 1: 4/12 Day 1: Train from Kolkata 5/12 Day 2: Reach Lal Kuan.... Transfer to Binsar 6/12 Day 3: Binsar 7/12 Day 4: Binsar To Chaukori 8/12 Day 5: Chaukori 10/12Day 7: Chaukori To Mukteshwar 11/12Day 8: Mukteshwar 12/12Day 9: Mukteshwar to Lal Kuan... Board Train 13/12Day10: Reach Kolkata 4/12 Day 1: Train from Kolkata 5/12 Day 2: Reach Lal Kuan.... Transfer to Chaukori 6/12 Day 3: Chaukori 7/12 Day 4: Chaukori To Munsiyari 8/12 Day 5: Munsiyari 10/12Day 7: Munsiyari To Binsar 11/12Day 8: Binsar 12/12Day 9: Binsar to Lal Kuan... Board Train 13/12Day10: Reach Kolkata a) Which plan looks better? b) Which plan will make me spend less money on transportation (assuming I'm taking car for transfers only)? c) What is the possibility and feasibility of availing shared transport? d) Appx how cold will the places be during that time? Thanks ahead Avishek.
